items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and Style
items.body: Fits amazingly and very soft and breathable material! Great quality and just the right length; not too long and not cut too short. Perfect for summer into fall dress. Not too casual and not too formal-Received lots of compliments on the design and style of dress as a wedding guest! Read more
items.author: Yesenia Angulo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect holiday + travel dress! Not sure why they call it â€œgoth,â€ but okay ðŸ˜‚
items.body: Bought this dress to wear on a trip to Charleston in December and I cannot wait to wear it. The fit is perfect â€” sexy but not too sexy, so you can still get away with it at a work Christmas party without feeling over the top. Iâ€™m not totally sure why itâ€™s labeled â€œgothicâ€ because it definitely doesnâ€™t give goth vibes at all lol. More like classy, flirty, and super flattering. For sizing reference, Iâ€™m 5'1â€, around 126 lbs, athletic and curvy built, and the size small fits great. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Holley H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: So cute, so comfortable, and honestly such a pretty dress. The mesh is really soft and the lining inside is the perfect mid-thigh length for curvy girlies which I was so afraid it would have been short since thatâ€™s a problem I often have. The length of the mesh is perfect for me, but it fits a little longer than pictured since Iâ€™m on the shorter side but definitely not long enough to drag on the floor which is great. Great quality for the price, flows nicely, only complaint Iâ€™d have is that because Iâ€™m curvier on the backside, there was a gap from my behind to where my back is that made this awkward piece of material that just kind of stuck out instead of flowing smoothly but my hair is long so it did a decent job of covering it. Other than that Iâ€™ve worn it a few times for different occasions all day/night long and was completely comfortable. Read more
items.author: Z

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute fall wedding guest dress
items.body: Love love love this dress. So comfortable. Quality is decent, but also fits the price. Fit well. Multi layered. The material is light and breathable. Color was as expected. Read more
items.author: MacKenzie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is beautiful!!!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress!! The fit , feel and length were on point. I bought an XL and it looked so good- I felt so confident in it especially around my belly area. This dress is just so flattering too it wraps around your curves. No wrinkles , it was a perfect dress. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I thought I wouldn't like it..
items.body: this dress isnâ€™t just a â€œgreat buy,â€ itâ€™s a whole vibe. Itâ€™s the kind of piece that doesnâ€™t scream for attention, but somehow everyone notices. The mesh overlay with that delicate rose pattern? Itâ€™s giving romantic poetry and moonlit gardens, but also a little edgeâ€”like you could wear it to a candlelit dinner or a moody concert and it would still make sense. The black paneling is genius. It keeps things grounded and wearable, offering just enough coverage to feel confident without losing that sheer, dreamy quality. Itâ€™s like the dress knows exactly what itâ€™s doingâ€”flirty but not too much, bold but not trying too hard. You can throw on some heels and a red lip and itâ€™s instantly dressy, or layer it with a chunky cardigan and boots and it leans more soft goth or artsy brunch. What I love most is how it shapeshifts depending on your mood. Some days it feels like a romantic heroine moment, other days itâ€™s giving â€œI might read tarot in the park.â€ And for the price? Honestly, it feels like cheating. Youâ€™re getting a dress that can do date night, gallery opening, backyard hang, or even just a â€œfelt cute, might romanticize my errandsâ€ kind of day. Itâ€™s not perfect in the way thatâ€™s boring or cookie-cutter. Itâ€™s perfect in the way that makes you feel like youâ€”a little mysterious, a little soft, a little powerful. And thatâ€™s the kind of perfect that actually matters. If youâ€™re even thinking about it, just go for it. This oneâ€™s going to earn its keep in your closet. Read more
items.author: Jade

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dress ever
items.body: I am Obsessed with this dress. Itâ€™s so cute and flattering. Definitely recommend as itâ€™s also comfortable. I got so many compliments that I bought another one in the animal print pattern. Definitely sexy and pretty but also it covers enough that you can wear it to church too! Read more
items.author: Valerie Emmett

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Filed under: flattering, fragile, and slightly suspicious.
items.body: First clue: the medium ran small. Iâ€™m almost always a medium with breathing room, but this one squeezed me like it knew a secret I didnâ€™t. Second clue: I actually liked the dress enough to reorder. The floral print and flow at the bottom are flattering, almost charming. But then I discovered the twist in the case file: this entire dress has no front or back. None. You can literally spin it around if you spill something, which is cleverâ€¦ but also makes the fit a little awkward. I found myself staring in the mirror, trying to decide which side was the â€œrealâ€ front. Final clue: the material is thin and feels like it could snag easily. Itâ€™s pretty, but I wouldnâ€™t trust it in a rowdy crowd or near anything sharper than a toothpick. Verdict? Cute enough to try again in a bigger size, but this dress is a puzzle that doesnâ€™t quite want to be solved. Read more
items.author: PollyEstherPants

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Leopard Frint, Black, Polka Dot Print, All Black, Multicolored, Red, Yellow Floral, Blue Floral, Purple, Yellow, Multicolor#3, Multicolor#2. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
